author: Xbox
description:
Sometimes, a colossal, walking machine is all you need…

SAND is an open-world PVPVE extraction shooter where players navigate giant walkers across the post-apocalyptic dunes of a fallen planet. Build your trampler, battle rival players, explore, loot and extract valuable resources in a hostile, ever-changing world. 

Coming to XBOX Series X|S

title: Share this with a Slayer in training 😤 #DOOMTheDarkAges #XboxGamePass #TipsAndTricks #DOOM

author: Xbox
description:
DOOM: The Dark Ages is here, and it’s back with a vengeance. It’s a brutal, medieval, mech-stomping prequel that redefines everything you thought you knew about the Slayer. In this video, we break down the five essential things you need to know about DOOM: The Dark Ages: whether you’re a longtime Slayer or thinking about picking up the mantle for the first time.

• [00:00] Intro
• [00:56] DOOM: The Dark Ages is a Prequel
• [01:36] The Universe Has Expanded
• [02:23] Gameplay Options
• [03:47] New and Fresh Combat
• [04:43] Mechs and Dragons
• [05:34] Outro

If you’re curious, on the fence, or already hyped: this is your one-stop primer on everything that makes DOOM: The Dark Ages so exciting. Get ready to Stand and Fight. Available now on Xbox Series X|S, PC and Game Pass Ultimate.

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

title: 5 Things That Got Us Hyped for DOOM: The Dark Ages

author: Xbox
description:
Legendary apocalyptic shooter series Metro is celebrating its 15th anniversary this year. To mark the occasion you can download Metro 2033 Redux completely free on Xbox until May 30. 

The Year is 2033. 20 years ago the world was devastated by an apocalyptic event annihilating almost all mankind and turning the Earth's surface into a poisonous wasteland. A handful of survivors took refuge in the depths of the Moscow underground, and human civilization entered a new Dark Age.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/metro-2033-redux/bpptrqzrj341

author: Xbox
description:
Build A Rocket Boy, the studio founded by visionary game director Leslie Benzies, and IOI Partners have released the Introducing MindsEye trailer, offering the most detailed glimpse yet into the game’s world. Set in the near-future desert metropolis of Redrock, MindsEye is a cinematic, narrative-driven AAA game where corporate power, political ambition, and surveillance collide.

You’ll step into the role of Jacob Diaz, whose personal mission escalates into a far-reaching conspiracy involving criminal forces, an unchecked military, and a threat so sinister it endangers humanity. The trailer showcases explosive action, high-stakes storytelling, and next-gen gameplay.

MindsEye also introduces Play.MindsEye, a continuous stream of developer-created content, and Build.MindsEye, a powerful tool that lets you create your own missions and environments with no prior programming experience.
MindsEye launches on June 10, 2025, for Xbox Series X|S, and PC. Pre-orders are available now and inclu
title: Introducing MindsEye
